text: Hey team, looking to work with Layla Campbell for Coles. Budget is approx $34,584 - need 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x 10-minute unboxing, 2 x YouTube short, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Brand photoshoot. 8 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: January 2026.
